scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='.next'; if(fs.existsSync(p)){ try { fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,maxRetries:3}); console.log('Cleaned .next'); } catch(e) { console.error('Stop the dev server first, then run: npm run clean'); process.exit(1); } } else { console.log('No .next folder'); }"
